definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Your lifejacket is located under your seat or beneath your central arm rest.
sentences.chinese: 你的救生衣裝在座位下或者中央扶手下面。

sentences.english: Tom's lifejacket had failed to inflate.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的救生衣未能充氣。

sentences.english: Life-saving equipment on aircraft passengers is mainly a life jacket.
sentences.chinese: 飛機上的救生設備對乘客來說主要是救生衣。

sentences.english: Additional lifejackets and flotation cots for small children and babies will be given out by the cabin crew.
sentences.chinese: 機組人員會爲孩子和嬰兒提供附加的救生衣和氣墊牀。

sentences.english: How could one throw oneself overboard a life-jacket ?
sentences.chinese: 一個人怎能跳下救生衣呢？

sentences.english: Crew demonstrating proper donning and wearing of lifejackets.
sentences.chinese: 船員演示正確穿着救生衣。

sentences.english: For ditching at night, a sea-light will be illuminated automatically.
sentences.chinese: 夜間迫降時，救生衣上的指示燈遇水會自動發亮。

sentences.english: The lifejacket whistle in Chief Mate's cabin missing.
sentences.chinese: 大副房間的救生衣哨子丟失。

sentences.english: When you get to your assembly stations, put on your lifejackets and wait for further orders.
sentences.chinese: 你到達集合地點時，穿上救生衣並等待進一步指令。

sentences.english: Wright and Savana took turns lending him their vests.
sentences.chinese: 賴特和薩瓦那輪流把救生衣借給蓋伊穿。

sentences.english: Recommend inclusion of this manual in the aviator's survival vest.
sentences.chinese: 推薦將本手冊置於飛行員的救生衣內。

sentences.english: The steamboat was fully furnished with life- preservers to the end that the passengers might be saved in case of accident.
sentences.chinese: 輪船上有足夠的救生衣，以便發生意外時乘客能逃生。

sentences.english: Make sure you grab a lifejacket. Have you ever been in a canoe before?
sentences.chinese: 記得帶救生衣。你曾劃過獨木舟嗎？

sentences.english: Don's lifejacket had failed to inflate.
sentences.chinese: 唐的救生衣未能充氣膨脹。

sentences.english: On a boat you must wear a lifejacket.
sentences.chinese: 在坐船的時候，你必須穿上救生衣。

sentences.english: Inflate your life jacket by pulling sharply on the cord.
sentences.chinese: 猛拽繩釦使你的救生衣充氣。
